sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, ORG_ID, STORE_NAME, STORE_ADDRESS, LINKMAN, TEL, ENABLE_FLAG, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, TYPE FROM HC_BUYER_STORE WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, PROJECT_ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, CONT_PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, COMMERCE_NAME, COMMON_NAME, CODE, ABBR_PY, ABBR_WB, BRAND, MODEL_ID, SPEC_ID, MODEL, SPEC, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, BASE_MEASURE, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, MAX_PRICE, HISTORY_PIRCE, PRICE, MANU_ID, MANU_NAME, MANU_NAME_ABBR, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, BUYER_ID, BALANCE_ID, BALANCE_NAME, BALANCE_EASY, BALANCE_FAST, BALANCE_WUBI, SALER_NAME_ABBR, DEFAULT_MEASURE, DEFAULT_MEASURE_EX, BAK_MEASURE_ONE, BAK_MEASURE_ONE_EX, BAK_MEASURE_TWO, BAK_MEASURE_TWO_EX, PRICE_DESCRIPTION, PERFORMANCE, PRE_PURCHASE, STATE_CHANGE_REASON, REG_NO, REG_VALID_DATE, DESCRIPTIONS, LAST_AMOUNT, LAST_SUM, LAST_DATE, ALL_AMOUNT, ALL_SUM, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, STATE, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, INSTRU_CODE, INSTRU_NAME FROM HC_ORD_HIT_COMM WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0' AND STATE != '0'

SELECT ID, BUYER_ID, CODE, TYPE, TOTAL_SUM, PURCHASE_DATE, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, STATE, AUDIT_USER_ID, AUDIT_USER_NAME, AUDIT_DATE, QUICKSEND_LEVEL, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME FROM HC_ORD_PURCHASE WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, PROJECT_ID, PURCHASE_ID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, BUYER_ID, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, SALER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, MANUFACTURE_ID, MANUFACTURE_NAME, MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, COMMON_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, SPEC, MODEL, BRAND, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, STORE_ROOM_ADDRESS, BASE_MEASURE, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, SEND_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE_EX, RETAIL_PRICE, TRADE_PRICE, AMOUNT, SUM, OVER_AMOUNT, OVER_SUM, IS_QUICKSEND, BALANCE_ID, BALANCE_NAME, BALANCE_EASY, BALANCE_FAST, BALANCE_WUBI, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, DESCRIPTIONS FROM HC_ORD_PURCHASE_ITEM WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

Select ID, ORDER_CODE, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, TOTAL_SUM, OVER_SUM, SALER_APPROVER_ID, SALER_APPROVER_NAME, SALER_APPROVER_DATE, STATE, TYPE, PURCHASE_DATE, QUICKSEND_LEVEL, SALER_DESCRIPTIONS, BUYER_DESCRIPTIONS, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, CREATE_USER_ID, PURCHASE_ID, PURCHASE_CODE From HC_ORD_ORDER Where STATE != '6' AND SYNC_STATE ='0'

SELECT ID, PROJECT_ID, ORDER_ID, PURCHASE_ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_NAME_ABBR, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, SALER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, MANUFACTURE_ID, MANUFACTURE_NAME, MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, COMMON_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, SPEC, MODEL, BRAND, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, STORE_ROOM_ADDRESS, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, BASE_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE_EX, RETAIL_PRICE, TRADE_PRICE, SUM, AMOUNT, OVER_AMOUNT, OVER_SUM, IS_QUICKSEND, ORDER_TYPE, STATE, BALANCE_ID, BALANCE_NAME, BALANCE_EASY, BALANCE_FAST, BALANCE_WUBI, BUYER_DESCRIPTIONS, SALER_DESCRIPTIONS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, PURCHASE_ITEM_ID, ORIGINAL_ITEM_ID, PARENT_ITEM_ID FROM HC_ORD_ORDER_ITEM WHERE STATE != '3' AND SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, ORDER_ID, ORDER_ITEM_ID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, STOCKUP_QTY, READY_FLAG, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, PBNO, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME FROM HC_ORD_ORDER_STOCKUP WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, TYPE, CODE, PROJECT_PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_ID, ORDER_ITEM_ID, INVOICE_ID, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, PBNO, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, ARRIVAL_ADDRESS, ARRIVE_DATE, PRICE, FACT_AMOUNT, FACT_SUM, RETURN_AMOUNT, RETURN_SUM, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, DESCRIPTIONS, STOCKUP_ID FROM HC_ORD_ORDER_RECEIVE WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, CODE, RECEIVE_ID, ORD_ID, ORD_ITEM_ID, PROJECT_PRODUCT_ID, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_NAME_ABBR, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, SALER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, MANUFACTURE_ID, MANUFACTURE_NAME, MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, COMMON_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, PBNO, BRAND, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, SPEC, MODEL, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO, PRICE, SUM, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, BASE_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE_EX, AMOUNT, STATE, SEND_OPERATOR_ID, SEND_OPERATOR_NAME, SEND_OPERATOR_DATE, INSTORE_OPERATOR_ID, INSTORE_OPERATOR_NAME, INSTORE_OPERATOR_DATE, BUYER_DESCRIPTIONS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, SALER_DESCRIPTIONS FROM HC_ORD_BUYER_RETURN WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_ID, ORDER_ITEM_ID, RECEIVE_ID, RETRUN_ID, RESULT_TYPE, TYPE, CODE, INVOICE_ID, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_NAME_ABBR, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, SALER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, MANUFACTURE_ID, MANUFACTURE_NAME, MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, SPEC, MODEL, COMMON_NAME, BRAND, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, PBNO, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, BASE_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE_EX, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, ARRIVAL_ADDRESS, ARRIVE_DATE, PRICE, FACT_AMOUNT, FACT_SUM, STATE, SEND_OPERATOR_ID, SEND_OPERATOR_NAME, SEND_OPERATOR_DATE, INSTORE_OPERATOR_ID, INSTORE_OPERATOR_NAME, INSTORE_OPERATOR_DATE, BACK_AMOUNT, BACK_SUM, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, DESCRIPTIONS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME FROM HC_ORD_ORDER_RESULT WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, INVOICE_CODE, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, TOTAL_SUM, OVER_SUM, SENDED_DATE, STATE, BUYER_DESCRIPTIONS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, SALER_DESCRIPTIONS FROM HC_ORD_INVOICE_FROM WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, INVOICE_FROM_ID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, BUYER_ID, SALER_ID, SALER_NAME, SALER_NAME_ABBR, MANUFACTURE_ID, MANUFACTURE_NAME, MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, COMMON_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, SPEC, MODEL, BRAND, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, BATCH_NO, VALID_DATE, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, STORE_ROOM_ADDRESS, BASE_MEASURE, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATER, SEND_MEASURE, SEND_MEASURE_EX, RETAIL_PRICE, TRADE_PRICE, AMOUNT, SUM, OVER_AMOUNT, OVER_SUM, STATE, BUYER_DESCRIPTIONS, BALANCE_ID, BALANCE_NAME, BALANCE_EASY, BALANCE_FAST, BALANCE_WUBI, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, SALER_DESCRIPTIONS, PBNO, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO FROM HC_ORD_INVOICE_FROM_ITEM WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, CODE, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_NAME_ABBR, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_NAME_ABBR, STATE, REMARK, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, CREATE_USER_ID, SEND_USER_ID, SEND_USER_NAME, SEND_DATE FROM HC_ORD_ORD_STOCK WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, STOCK_ID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, MANUFACTURE_ID, MANUFACTURE_NAME, MANUFACTURE_NAME_ABBR, COMMON_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, BRAND, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, SPEC, MODEL, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, BATCH_NO, VALID_DATE, NUM, STATE, REMARK, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, PBNO, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO FROM HC_ORD_ORD_STOCK_ITEM WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, BUYER_ID, SALER_ID, SENDER_ID, PBNO, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO, SENDER_NAME, PROJECT_PRODUCT_ID, SPEC_ID, MODEL_ID, BARCODE, PRICE, BATCH_NO, VALID_DATE, NUM, REMARK, STATE, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, STOCK_ITEM_ID FROM HC_ORD_SECOND_AYRLNV WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, SECOND_ID, DATA_PRODUCT_ID, PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_PRODUCT_ID, GOODS_NO, BARCODE, PBNO, SEND_BATCH_NO, INSTORE_BATCH_NO, STORE_ROOM_ID, STORE_ROOM_NAME, ARRIVAL_ADDRESS, ARRIVE_DATE, PRICE, FACT_AMOUNT, FACT_SUM, STATUS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, DESCRIPTIONS, BUYER_ID, SENDER_ID FROM HC_ORG_SECOND_AYRLNV_USE WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'
SELECT ID, PROJECT_ID, BULLETIN_ID, RECEIVER_ID, IS_READ, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, CREATE_USER_ID FROM HC_BULLETIN_RECEIVER WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

sql.sqlstring: SELECT ID, ORGID, HIT_COMM_ID, PRODUCT_MNEMONIC, MODIFY_USERID, SELF_PACKAGE, ALIAS, ALIAS_PINYIN FROM HC_SELF_DEFINE_INFO WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, MAP_ORGTYPE, MAP_ORGID, PROJECT_PROD_ID, HH_MODE_ID, HH_SPEC_ID, PRODUCT_ID, HIS_PRODUCT_ID, COMMON_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, COMMERCE_NAME, BRAND, MODE_ID, MODE_NAME, SPEC_ID, SPEC, BASE_MEASURE, BASE_MEASURE_SPEC, BASE_MEASURE_MATE, STAND_RATE, FACTORY_CODE, FACTORY_Name, SALER_CODE, SALER_NAME, SENDER_CODE, SENDER_NAME, STOCK_ID, STOCK_NAME, MODIFY_USERID, PROCESS_FLAG, SYNC_STATE, REMARK, ISMAP FROM HC_PRODUCT_MAP WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'

SELECT ID, MAP_ORGTYPE, MAP_ORGID, ORG_ID, HIS_ORG_ID, FULL_NAME, EASY_NAME, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, TELPHONE, LINKMAN, ISFACTORY, ISSENDER, ISSALER, MODIFY_USERID, PROCESS_FLAG, SYNC_STATE, REMARK, ISMAP FROM HC_CORP_MAP WHERE SYNC_STATE = '0'
